section.title: Adding Event Transactions to Documents
section.para: Tracker's Transaction processing infrastructure supports adding real time RFID Tag reader events to Tracker Premises Documents. Premises Documents can receive new events concurrently from one or many RFID Tag readers. Communication connections from RFID Tag readers are managed by Tracker Event Publishers. Tracker Event Publishers publish messages received from RFID Tag readers as Event Transactions. These Event Transactions are then processed by Tracker's Transaction processing infrastructure.

Similar to Tracker Bulk Event Processing, Tracker Event Publishers use Animal Document Templates to associate event details with specific RFID Tag reader messages. As RFID Tag reader messages are received they are published as one or more event transactions and subsequently added to the Animal corresponding to the Tag/@idNumber in the message.

section.title: File Tailing Event Publisher
section.para:
Most tag readers transmit the numbers representing the animal id as an ASCII text string. A typical way to handle these text strings is to appended them as they are received to end of text files. Tracker's File Tailing Event Publisher will periodically read and create Event Transactions from new messages added to the tail end of specified text files.
For the beta release only a single File Tailing Event Publisher is supported at this time.

section.title: Tracker Event Publisher View
section.para:
From the Workbench Window menu
Select Show View
Select Other
Select Tracker
Select Event Publishers

section.title: Configuring File Tailing Event Publisher
section.para:
From the Workbench Window menu:
Select Preferences...
Select Tracker
Select Event Publisher
Configuring requires setting the preferences for:
The Capture File is the name of the file to be read periodically by the File Tailing Publisher. This is the file that the RFID reader will be appending messages to.
The Template File that will be associated with the incoming RFID messages.
The Capture File Read Interval is the time interval to wait before rereading the file for new messages.
